website_summaries.verdict: A light, hard-shell 3-piece luggage set at a bargain price for extra toughness without weighing you down.
pros: Wear on suitcases is barely noticeable due to texture of shell
Telescoping handle and 4 multi-directional wheels for easy maneuvering in crowded airports
Zippers lock in place into TSA locks, which are easy to set
Orange is very bright and easy to spot at airport (also comes in other colors)
28-inch case is expandable for 15 percent more space
cons: Handles too short for people over 6 ft. tall
No outside pockets in hard-shell exterior

customer_reviews.title: Took A Beating With No Problems
customer_reviews.text: Luggage went on a plane, bus, boat vacation. At the end of 2 weeks, the luggage had some scuffs. But nothing happened to the stuff inside. And the color is wonderful. Easy to find in airport terminals or even on the underside of a bus. I could always spot my luggage. Great products. And they all store inside of the next larger piece so I don't have to have an extra closet for the luggage,
customer_reviews.author: JanJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, I Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got it a few weeks ago but didn't get a chance to use til July. It's new, beautiful and didn't have problems with the TSA lock or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Patch

customer_reviews.title: Update. 12/24/2018. 2 months of daily use and still not a single issue.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a trip even after reading some negative reviews. My thoughts were can't please everyone so we gave them a try. Absolutely glad we did. We had NO issues what so ever,loved them. I travel daily and away from home overnight more than 300 days a year. Against my wifes objections I decided to use mine daily at work. After 3 months my luggage has held up great. Absolutely no issues what so ever. Our next trip I will order another one for me so it looks as good as my wifes.
customer_reviews.author: D L  Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I used these on a trip to the east coast to rate them. They held up well despite several scratches but I am very happy with this product. I usually take wine with me when I travel and having a hard-side suitcase made that even easier because it was more protection then my previous soft-side suitcases provided. I love the wheels on these suitcases - they roll very smoothly and can go over bumps in the road and sidewalks without getting stuck. I would recommend these to anyone looking for an affordable set of hard-side suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I were going on a trip to Spain, and I needed a new set. After reading reviews on a few different sets, I chose these for their color choice, the price, and the fact it came with three suitcases not two. From Albuquerque, NM to Los Angeles, Los Angeles to Washington DC, Washington to Barcelona, and back again. I’m very impressed with how well they held up. Some scratches on the exterior, which was to be expected. But zippers all held up and work great. They roll very easy, and the locks work great. For the price, I couldn’t be happier. I’ve already recommended these to friends and co-workers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hulette

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and durable. TSA locks +
customer_reviews.text: I will be taking a flight in a few weeks , will update then. Just received luggage and so far very impressed. It is very good looking and durable. I like the TSA locks. Also it was very thoughtful to make all of the handles extend to the same height. Very spacious inside. Looks sleek. Can’t wait to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable price for such a great set of luggage! - Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on Saturday afternoon and received on Monday afternoon at my office. I opened the box, read the card instructions about the lock, opened the lock and placed all 3 pieces next to my desk. They are so beautiful and better made than I thought they would be. Every person at work came in and looked at the luggage and offered me money to buy the set! When I told them the price, they all said...."No Way"....Just a great set of luggage. I am using next month for a vacation and cant wait to use them. I recommend this set to everyone, just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems very well made and the wheels roll great. I'm 6 feet and have had telescopic handles ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Coolife Luggage, so I haven't used it yet. It seems very well made and the wheels roll great. I'm 6 feet and have had telescopic handles that are too short. My son is 6'5" and these handles are frequently useless to him, but the one on this luggage seems plenty long. It also has two positions, so someone short would be OK too. I'm heading to China and Hawaii over the next few months so I am hoping the luggage wears as well as it looks. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: JMills

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy. Great Survival Skills!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I recently returned from a cruise. As a testament, we needed to fly to the West Coast of the US from the East Coast; board the cruise ship; debark for another week's shore stay; AND THEN, fly home. During those 3+ weeks, this luggage survived 5 airline connections, the ship's embarkation and debarkation processes, and a significant drag from the spot the cruise line left us to a place where we could pick up our rental car. I believe this would equal about three normal trips, so I am confident in saying that this luggage is tough, well-constructed, and impossibly light. Thanks for a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: An Amateur Renaissance ManTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Well made, reliable, long-lasting luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful (and beautifully made) piece of luggage. The zippers and locks all seem very robust - the 000 codes were set for us and easy to change, unlike some reviews I read. The color is magnificent - a beautiful dark blue - Descendants 2 Purple according to my 7 year old daughter - and will stand out on a luggage conveyer belt. Overall - very happy. Of course, the real test will be in a couple of years of frequent travel to see how it holds up but based on first impressions, I've no doubt it will.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy Setting Lock Combo
customer_reviews.text: At first I was leary about buying these pieces of luggage. Even after I found these babies I continued to look at others but I always came back to these. The color is nice. Its more of a deep red maybe burgundy. Looks scratch resistant in other words the finish it not a smooth finish which is great. They are very light and roll around easily. I love the TSA locks that are on all 3 pieces of luggage. Setting your combination code is easy. It does come with instructions and are only about 4 steps. This luggage is not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Belle F

customer_reviews.title: Pure ABS, *NOT* ABS+PC as described in listing...
customer_reviews.text: Descrpiption for this set states that it’s made of ABS+PC (polycarbonate), but even their own website says it’s 100% ABS (cheaper, not durable). Now I have to return, as ABS only luggage isn’t what I thought I was getting based on the Amazon published description. Bat and Switch.... flimsy plastic....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Easy movement!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, easy movement, and amazing space. The 3 piece luggage set arrived the end of August and immediately went into service for two weeks vacation time in the Swiss alps and northern Italy. Perfect! Not even a scratch or a ding even though the suitcases had four transfers. Arrived in perfect condition and a day early.
customer_reviews.author: glassdream

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, love the bright orange, easy to spot. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These came in perfect condition, very happy with the quality, pre-trip. I'll repost after the vacation, to let you know how they hold up. These were much larger than I expected, which was a good thing, very roomy, with convenient zipper cover inside to hold your clothing in place. update: made it to Maui and back, had many complements at the airport, because you could see my laugage coming. Locks worked fine, and hard shell prevents breakage of items inside. Great little set for the price, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Wells

customer_reviews.title: Coolidge luggage
customer_reviews.text: Will be using our luggage in December and I can update at a later time. But having the luggage in the house it feels very well made and the wheels on are smooth and Quiet. Rolls very well.
customer_reviews.author: Martin F. Comaianni

customer_reviews.title: Used once and cannot use again
customer_reviews.text: I used these suitcases once to fly. The middle sized one completely broke. I lost belongings because the zipper didn't keep it shut. I had to wrap it to fly back home. The wheel on the biggest one completely bent and is no longer rollable. Cheaply made. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda E Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Best luggage I’ve had so far
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to spot on the luggage belt as it has a nice finish and well made. Definitely paid less than what it’s worth. I bought my son a Tag Heuer carry on luggage with similar design as the smallest one in this set for twice as much and his had a flimsier handle and the wheels didn’t turn as smoothly as this one did.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke off after third use.  Company refused to give a refund.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a three piece luggage set from Coolife. Initially I was happy with the look and performance. However, during just my third trip a wheel broke off of the 28 in. suitcase as can be seen in the pictures -- rendering the item unusable. I have not yet used either of the smaller cases yet, but the wheel looks just the same so I am concerned about their longevity as well. This occurred about 45 days after purchase and the company refused to grant me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW: GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: When I originally purchased the set of luggage, we took them on vacation right away. The largest suitcase had one of its wheels disintegrate after a single use. I posted a review that said as much, and was contacted by Coolife's customer service department. They worked with me to resolve the issue, and my replacement case is on its way. I was disappointed by the failure, but I am VERY pleased with their efforts to resolve the situation. This certainly makes me much more willing to support this company. The luggage itself is quite sturdy, and protected our belongs well. We've used cloth suitcases before, and this was our first hard-shell set. We're quite pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: PastorEdB

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases came quickly and not damaged. The quality of the outer shell and inside mesh seems good! I’m a little concerned about the plastic wheels, but so far so good. I love how they nest within each other for easy storing. I’m excited to use them for our cruise in June.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, did I say Love? These look grea in person. They are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Renise

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God these are the worst. They “silver” looks so cheap. Like the cheapest plastic. I returned them but I have to use them tomorrow on a trip. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sabatino

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but will they last?
customer_reviews.text: It is lightweight and pretty sturdy, but... it was scratched up before we even got to the airport. The wheels worked well, I haven't had this type with multidirectional casters before. It took some getting used to, but I really liked it. I'm not sure how well the retractable handle will hold up over time, (the pressure of moving the suitcase using it seemed a bit flimsy... But these served us well on 4 flights and in and out of a car roughly 109 times over a 10 day trip. Got this in navy- loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Glitterific

customer_reviews.title: pretty good luggage
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the bright orange color, which makes it very identifiable. It rolls and moves easily, and is very lightweight. Each piece fits inside the next, making it easy to store. We used all 3 pieces to go on a cruise, and they all appeared very durable, although they did get a little scuffed up. Cons: The zippers don't moves smoothly, especially around the corners. You have to be careful getting them zipped. However once zipped, they felt very secure. Only the large suitcase expands. The carry on and the mid sized suitcases do not, which was disappointing. The carry on was very minimal in size and what it would hold.
customer_reviews.author: Christy R. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: I really like that they expand
customer_reviews.text: I looked through the reviews before I bought them. I really like that they expand. Used them for the first time on a trip out of the US. The plastic around the wheels broke by the time we reached our destination on 2 of the pieces. Love the color, has lots of room. Loved the zipped divider. A lil sad that they are not made of a durable plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, it will be easy to locate on the airport.
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and made. will be using it this week and update durability after the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Michael &Tulay C

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good but haven’t tried
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet - about to take a 3-week trip. Quality seems very good - as advertised. Love ghtweighy, wheels seem sturdy. Like the locking feature. Quick customer support when I needed to reset lock that was accidentally set tonwrong combo. Wish there was a handle on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: The suit cases look amazing, but the zipper broke after the first use. Now it can’t be used since the zipper came off and is now worthless.
customer_reviews.author: TRACEY DOMINIK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for new luggage for a trip to England. After researching and waivering about purchasing hardside luggage, I went ahead and ordered this set. It arrived nicely packaged and on time. The luggage feels sturdier than other hardside luggage that I have seen and the wheels make it effortless to roll. The TSA approved locks are a nice addition and make me feel safer about who can get into my luggage. The color of this set is true to the pictures. It will definitely be easy to spot at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Survived First Airline Trip Unscathed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and ended up borrowing one for a recent flight. We'd used them for short trips and knew they'd be well cared for in our car, so baggage handling at the airports were the first test. The luggage came through unscathed and in great condition after four flights and being thrown over the loading ramp onto the tarmac. (Yes, I was watching the luggage being loaded.) I did buy luggage straps for extra security on these since they were untested, and the luggage straps probably added a layer of protection given the condition they returned in, but I'm very satisfied with this purchase. The luggage is light weight, feels durable, and rolls nicely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, but easily scratched
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package, there was already a scratch on the top even though it was wrapped in plastic. I took the middle size out, and it was scratched in the exact same place. As I was leaving for a business trip within a few days, there was no time to get a new set. I was very disappointed because I absolutely LOVE the wine red! Sent it back, and will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Quality control should be better. I received my set the day before I travelled and the largest piece came scuffed on sides and handle. The TSA lock was not set to the 0000. Lock is useless because combination had already been set. The smaller luggage in the set looked great and “new”. Returned to my local Kohl’s which is an Amazon drop-off and they gave me a 25% discount coupon . Went to their luggage department and their luggage was on sale. This set would still have been cheaper though. Too bad it did not work out. Luggage did look nice and adequate except for the largest piece.
customer_reviews.author: vpage

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: The product came as described with no damage! I’ve received them a couple of days ago and haven’t been able to use it yet as my travel date has yet to come but from my initial view of the products, they are well-designed, moves, lightweight, and seemingly quite durable (did not give five star because I haven’t used yet). I’m looking forward to using them and will change the review based on the result afterward!
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Doak

customer_reviews.title: To be continued
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the luggage based on reviews for two big trips this year....to Long Beach next week, and to Europe in August. The look is impressive. It seems to carry more than the it looks like it could. I am impressed...but the first test of durability is next week....those 4 stars could easily be 5 stars based on how it holds up....To Be Continued...
customer_reviews.author: Calvin A. Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Survived a fall
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our move back to the mainland. We had a laptop in one and an xbox in another. Rented a minivan and the back didnt latch correctly... bags ended up flying out the back while we were driving. They have some road burn, but our stuff was fine!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Yellott

customer_reviews.title: Broken on the 1st trip
customer_reviews.text: The area that holds the wheel in place was destroyed on the 1st leg of my flight making it difficult to steer the suitcase for the remaining legs of the journey. Update: Soon after posting my review I was contacted by Coolife. After seeing the damage, they reimbursed me for the suitcase that was broken. It was fair. My experience with customer service was excellent, wish the suitcase was.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: This luggage is not very durable!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this luggage in time for vacation. I understand the price is on the low end,so I know you get what you pay for..however I didn't expect the luggage to under perform on the very first time. The nylon cloth area surrounding the zipper starting shedding . I pulled away the thread each time I needed to zip or unzip the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love them and they appear quite durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for an upcoming cruise !! We travel alot and always watch our luggage get tossed around and smashed. So when I seen this set of 3 for the cost of one suitcase elsewhere, I felt it was time to try them. They were delivered on time and packaged well. The true test will be in a few weeks when they will be tossed about on our cruise so I’ll update my review then. At this point, I love them and they appear quite durable !! Bon Voyage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & good Proce
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for 2 overseas trip and the bags have been convenient. The wheels are easy to maneuver around and the bags are light yet sturdy to handle the abuse of a multi leg journey. And the red color makes it easy to spot on the carousel when waiting for the luggage. The construction seems sturdy enough that i think it will definitely make it to multiple trips.
customer_reviews.author: P. Contractor

customer_reviews.title: ONLY THE LARGEST SUITCASE EXPANDS!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set help up well throughout my trip to Lake Tahoe and Maine. At some point I had so much stuff crammed into them that I had to sit on them to close them. I was concerned that the zippers wouldn’t hold up, but they did!! A+ for that. The wheels rolled nice and smoothly. However, I was disappointed when I discovered that only the largest of the 3 is expandable. I would have gave this 5 stars if all 3 were expandable.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Durable and overall a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to Japan for 14 days and no problems what so ever. These suit cases took a good beating and still lasted and quiet on flat surfaces, it is a bit loud on street surfaces but I think it's like that for all suitcases. I would accidentally hit the wheels carrying it up stairs or it's side without any noticeable damage. I love the side locks and it was very easy to use. I would definitely recommend all cool life brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product but the zipper broke within a year.  Fixed it myself but damn
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a hard shell type luggage set which fit the description. Works well aside from the zipper breaking in less than a year. Was able to fix it myself but disappointing that it broke that soon. This only happened on one of the luggage pieces. TSA lock approves which was also nice. Was trying to avoid buying an overly expensive brand name one. Still able to use and using to this day but was upset when that zipper broke Update: since writing this review coollife has reached out to me to see what they can do to improve their product. Adding a star for customer service
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Young

customer_reviews.title: Overall well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the luggage and it is beautiful but it has sustained multiple scratches and gouging of the hard cover during his first trip with the luggage. I was surprised on how easily the luggage can become damaged.
customer_reviews.author: TamTam

customer_reviews.title: Easily rolls and easy storage
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility of the luggage and the ability to choose your luggage size requirements as you are provided with all three pieces that are shown, which conveniently fit the smallest into the middle one then the middle into the largest one making the room required for storage only needing to be big enough for the largest of the three. The wheel casters roll pretty easily on different types of carpet very easily making transition easy. The sturdiness appears to be well done but I haven't tested it against airport luggage moving machines and bag handlers yet will update when I take an airline trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: Good for any trip
customer_reviews.text: The different sizes give you the option to choose based on trip length. I took a week long trip and the medium size case was perfect. The case wasn't too packed and was able to even bring back souvenirs safely. The combination lock was easy to set and it's always nice to have that extra sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah F.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few days before my flight and I love it! This is my first hard shell suitcase and I'm wondering why it took so long for me to try it. I love how the inside unzips so you have two sides to pack plus the pocket zipper. Because of that function, I didn't have to use the biggest size, just the medium and carry on. Very durable, we all know how they handle suitcases at the airport, when I got to the resort, everything was still in place. Definitely recommend this set!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaKandra T

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a cruise.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fact it was hard-sided and had the wheels that spun. Seems to be able to handle heavy loads with ease. Don't like the fact it doesn't have any pockets to store small items inside and no extra zip compartment on the outside. I knew this when I purchased them but didn't miss them until my trip. Does have TSA locks on them so secure against snoopy baggage handlers and hotel/motel staff. All in all, a well made and sturdy utilitarian product. If the missing compartments aren't missed by the purchaser, you'll love the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie V

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Luggage is ok. It made it through the airport and was easy to move. I've only used the smallest piece on one flight and the wheel broke. It's still usable but I'm sure this luggage won't last long if it's breaking after the first flight. Update: The company contacted me to try and remedy the situation with the luggage with was a positive. They did pester me multiple times to change my review after their solution. I have still only used the one piece one time. As I continue to use the luggage I will update again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: stacy123456

customer_reviews.title: Broken wheel
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for a trip to Italy in 2019. During that trip about 5 days in one of the wheels broke. We were able to limp our way through the rest of the vacation going on trains and planes and cobblestone streets, but I was not impressed with the wheels. the luggage is lightweight and we loved the Orange as we could spot it at the airport easily. I contacted Amazon and they gave me a partial refund for the broken wheel, which I am satisfied with. As far as recommending this product, It would really depend on how much you are going to use it. We put it to the test and it partially failed. You judge!
customer_reviews.author: Ninavpl

customer_reviews.title: Exceelent luggage.  Could use a few more pockets.
customer_reviews.text: We took the luggage on a trip to Cancun. In and out of 4 different hotels and the rental car, manhandled by porters, courtesy van, etc. Not a scratch. Very lightweight and the easiest to roll of anything I've ever encountered. You can push these forward and they'll roll right down the sidewalk a ways. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Only the largest suitcase expands.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a suitcase set that the 28 and 24" suitcase were expandable. I only notice after I had purchase the suitcase set that only the largest one was expandable not very happy about that .
customer_reviews.author: Nonya

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is beautiful. My order was delivered by USPS within 2 days as promised.My only problem is that all tags on the set is in German which I can't understand as I only understand English. This is a minor issue but I would definitely recommend these they as really nice.
customer_reviews.author: MR.Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of luggage! Lots of room inside. The outside is ABS plastic so it is flexible, but better than soft sided luggage. The 4 wheels make it easy to roll and steer. Price was great and delivery was Amazon fast! Can’t wait to take it Hawaii later this year!
customer_reviews.author: Mingii

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Just got my orange 3 piece set today. The quality was better than expected considering the price. These look so nice I don't even want to use them. They will be tested out next week so I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: N. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke on the First Trip
customer_reviews.text: I used the large suitcase for the first time on a trip to Israel. No problem on the flight over. Unfortunately on the return flight the suitcase arrived in two pieces. The zipper had broken. Fortunately I had put a "strap" around the suitcase to make it easier to identify my suitcase among all the others. In addition I always use packing cubes, so my clothes did not end up scattered all over. I have not used the other 2 sizes. I hesitate to use them as they do not seem durable enough to use on a flight.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Endured several international flights
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with the purchase. I've traveled internationally from the US to three international destinations (which included 5 times claiming my luggage and re-checking them). I have close to 50 lbs of contents in the 2 larger containers and it held well.
customer_reviews.author: EvanstonStuff

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The 24 inch case arrived damaged in an undamaged box. It's really frustrating to buy something new and it arrives used or damaged. This is clearly an issue with the manufacturer. It makes me wonder if this stuff will hold up for one trip. It all looks good but looks can be deceiving. I can only allow one star due to the fact that I got damaged goods upon arrival. It's a lot of trouble to ship this stuff back so I will have to eat Amazon's mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Quilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Produt - Have used many times
customer_reviews.text: Have used the luggage 6 or 7 times now. It holds up to airport security and baggage handlers. Love the TSA lock feature. I recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Material!
customer_reviews.text: Not Cool @ all this happened on the 1st trip not even 7 days old and the palstic is already giving in! 🤮😤😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: Was apprehensive when I ordered because of the low price. What a nice surprise when it arrived! This luggage seems very sturdy had has smooth zippers and wheels. The bright orange color means I should be able to spot it on a carousel right away lol. Can’t wait to use it on my cruise next month. Can’t really speak to the durability yet but I can see virtually no difference between these and the much more expensive samsonites
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this set of lugage....So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set and the middle cases handle button would not work (stuck in the down position), I learned this after I packed one day before my business trip. I emailed customer service and they called me back and offered to send me the new piece, great customer service! I was a bit nervous of the thickness of the shell of the case but, I have traveled with the large bag and it outstanding. The case rolled great on various surfaces, the zipper did fine( I found that if you lift the one side of the case up while zipping it zips a lot easier). The TSA locks are a nice feature to have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scubasteveb

customer_reviews.title: the medion size suitcase
customer_reviews.text: They are of good quality, they work well, but the suitcase of medium size can not be enlarged and according to my opinion it is the suitcase that most needs it, in order to reach the maximum amount of weight allowed in the airlines.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Lander

customer_reviews.title: items described and appear to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: items arrived on time and was as described in description. Have not had a chance to use the luggage yet but will in the near future on a flight and cruise. Will see how they hold up to the abuse and possibly re-evaluate them at a later date. After going on our Caribbean cruise, the luggage set survived the airport and cruise line throwing them around with minimal battle scars. For the price paid for the luggage set, it is a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wakeman

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful. Rolls with ease
customer_reviews.text: Just received our luggage. First matching luggage we've had in our 33 year marriage. It is beautiful. Rolls with ease. We won't use it to end of October when we take train out east to D.C. I will write more then when we actually have to change trains in Chicago, etc. I'm debating shipping luggage UPS and just taking our carry on with meds, and change of clothes. Color is beautiful (wine), set our locks, (318) hoping to remember our secret code. This post is also for dating, with 2 year guarantee we have.
customer_reviews.author: DARLA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for his summer abroad. He only took the largest (checked) and smallest suitcase (carryon). Both exceeded our expectations! Durable and strong exterior (he brought back wine in the checked bag and it survived!! Very spacious interior. I took away 1 star due to no hanging clothes section and the locks are a big tricky, but for a 20 y/o guy these weren’t as big an issue as it was for me. Still can’t believe the price!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Diva life

customer_reviews.title: Warranty?  Great bags lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this luggage for 1 year and love it but my 24” wheel bag has come off making the bag very hard to roll anymore. It’s very hard to contact the company as there are no phone numbers or email address on any of the paperwork-I have all tags showing a 2 year warranty but no way to contact them. I have the Merdes bags.
customer_reviews.author: kwork

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well these held up. We recently took a trip involving airline travel and a cruise ship and they came through beautifully. They seem fairly flimsy but are sturdier than they look. I love the TSA locks and the dark blue color! Also, we had to pull all three suitcases for almost 2 miles through rough streets and the wheels held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: amazedbyGod

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I didnt know how they where gonna ship all 3 bags, but they all fit into each other which I think it's cool for storing it later but I love it I probably will only use one at a time but it's a bargain to buy all 3 cool is great and the sizes are great I'm super excited to use this on my next trip maybe I will do an update after the trip, but I say buy it worth the money
customer_reviews.author: TJ CASEY

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these for a trip to Vegas. We only used the larger two, and they were awesome. Lots of space inside. On the way back I even packed my garment bag. I didn't notice any scratches or scuffs on our return. The 4 wheels make this so easy to use, Thinking of getting another of the large ones for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but handle with care
customer_reviews.text: We love the luggage but the lock system was a problem for me. While I was trying to set the new combination the lock accepted just a random number that was on the dial. Since I didn't know what the number was I now get to go through all 999 possibilities if I want to use the lock. Could have used better instructions, especially how the zipper latches just pop into the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sniknej

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, expensive looking luggage
customer_reviews.text: Only traveled with these once thus far, but surprising spacious for being lightweight. The exterior took a hit with a few scratches at the end of the trip but that doesn’t bother me, if that’s a problem for you, you might want to consider soft shell luggage .
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Really good luggage set at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a luggage set to take on a long haul intercontinental trip and I wanted something that would survive significant wear and tear. This luggage more then held up its end. There were minor scratches here and there after the flights but overall there were no dents, cracks or any permanent damage. All the items within the suitcases were in perfect condition. Considering the price tag I would recommend this as a pretty good bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chovnick

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this luggage set for our trip to Mexico, the small bag is great for a carry-on and the largest bag will fit anything you need. Very high quality materials. The combos are easy to change to whatever you want them to be. The zippers on the inside hold up to a lot of abuse and keep everything seperated well.
customer_reviews.author: MaKayla Poplin

customer_reviews.title: great so far.
customer_reviews.text: took two pieces on cruise and flights to and from port. performed well. Easy to move about, light weight and came through with only a few expected marks from flight
customer_reviews.author: Therese L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is GREAT. The wheels glide smoothly, very flexible for packing lots of clothes. Used for recent air travel and checked the luggage there were no scratches or dents and I can identify my luggage easily due to my color selection. I highly recommend this luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Travel becomes worth doing with Coolife luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a set of this luggage for years and finally have them, looking forward to my first trip using them. I especially like the double wheels as they do not get hung up in places the single wheels do which causes unnecessary irritation during travel. I also like the colors they have selected, the locking system on them and the warranty Coolife includes.
customer_reviews.author: Texacali

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Yes they roll fine and they hold luggage. BUT,,,,, they are a pain to use. one side zips up and if you open it wrong side up,,, all the cloths come out. if it is heavy on one side when you close it, it gets a little off center and is a pain to zip up. I suppose if it is just to transport the cloths to a dresser it is ok. but if you are on a trip that you are living out of the suitcase,, do not buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: Ok...but.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality only problem is only one suitcase is expanding the larger one which if you expand it, it will weigh to much. I would rather have the smaller ones expandable in case you take more back. If I had time I would exchange.
customer_reviews.author: ZMEGO

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Go Wrong!
customer_reviews.text: We love these suitcases, we even bought an extra small size so that we could have matching carry ins but comparing price/value to other brands- you can’t go wrong here!
customer_reviews.author: Buddysmom

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really do like the bags. I like the color is easy to see. I like the size and the outside zipper has held up well. But the inside is fraying at the seems and the whole thing is coming apart inside. If it was just the thread coming out I could have sewn it. I emailed the company and they made it right I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: rona

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: At first sight I loved the color. Then I couldn't help loving the price. I loved the price. When my luggage arrived the quality ( including the wheels and combination locks) elevated my purchase to a whole new level. I'm a happy shopper. 😍🤗😍
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Did not make 1 trip!  SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: Did not even make 1 way, to Disney! Spent alot of time reviewing luggage and thought I made right choice and could not be anymore disappointed! It showed up at hotel all crushed in! Had bought for my 6 year old granddaughter and thought it would be a perfect choice and so disappointed ! It was the worst start to beginning of our Disney trip! It turned out to be a VERY BAD purchase! Cannot use again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and in great shape. The luggage is so much lighter than our older luggage and the wheels are very smooth when rolled on a hard surface. It looks durable and I love the color! We haven't taken it on a trip yet so I may update later if I find any issues with it once we take it on a flight or car trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A. Covey

customer_reviews.title: Good material, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good luggage case, we bought this for our trip to vietnam and it held good the whole trip with 8 connecting flights. Red color make it stand out and easy to spot. The material is really good. The only thing is the wheel that I’m afraid to sit on but other than that it’s rolling like it supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and used for travels and trip from Missouri to Sydney Australia. Served my needs extremely well, light weight, strong, durable, secure, and very easy to maneuver. Still appears in brand new conditions upon return back home.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Moves so well!
customer_reviews.text: Love these suitcases! First impression was the design was nice. They came packaged carefully so no damage in the shipping process. When I used them for the first time, they moved so well. Super smooth and easy to get over bumps on the flooring. There was some scratches on my 28 inch suitcase but after being on transferred to multiple planes they held up really well! I would definitely recommend and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy & Sad
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely so excited to receive our new luggage set. Everything seem as perfect as advertised. 1st trip 2 days after receiving and this is what I have now. Granted im sure its wasnt treated with the gentle care via airport staff but I did except the luggage to hold up better. Not sure how to fix these screws sticking out the side where bumbers use to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feels flimsy but functions solidly
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a medium sized suitcase that was light and spun well. This seemed too good to be true--3 for the price of one. The cases are of a thin material and the handle felt like it would pull out with the medium case fully loaded but it has held up to two trips with no problem. They seem nice for the price. I would suggest not loading the large case with dense items. (It would be overweight and I fear also break open.) It would be good for a bunch of bulky winter clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Exciting find
customer_reviews.text: After searching dozens of sites for a super lightweight, lockable, pocketed hardside luggage set I was starting to think my combo of preferrances was going to be impossible to find. Then I stumbled on this set! It arrived yesterday and I will be taking it on a business trip tomorrow. Looking forward to trying out this item instead of the soft side suitcases that have torn after short uses. Set is exactly as described and look sleek too. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Not that tough
customer_reviews.text: Took all three pieces on a family trip with air travel, we were gone for 10 days and unpacked once we arrived at our destination. Upon returning home we had a zipper malfunction with a broken tooth, a messed up wheel and a broken handle. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Attractive luggage / fast shipping / seems like it will be durable!
customer_reviews.text: Received the luggage with Prime shipping and it was packaged nicely and arrived in pristine condition. All parts seem in good order and wheels roll wonderfully! We are going on first trip this weekend so we'll put these to use. Will update review if anything "less than stellar" presents itself. Otherwise, will be ordering another set - this first set was a "test run!"
customer_reviews.author: Curt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: In our first trip the inside of the luggage was ripped. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Glaudson C.

customer_reviews.title: A little too weighty for my taste
customer_reviews.text: I liked it it did what it was supposed to but it is heavy very heavy I expected it to be significantly lighter The wheels don't turn as well as I had hoped and the handle on one trip was sticking already. But it'll get you where you need to go with what you need to go with
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Kropchak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once since I received it a week ago....I didn't use it in an airport just a local staycation but they are very roomy, sturdy, wheels move perfectly. No issues found during my use. I don't travel often I upgraded to this luggage set from a cheap set I had for 20+ years...... so for me..... this was a huge upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: My worries came true.
customer_reviews.text: i changed my review of this product. It’s broken already. It dented, ripped the liner and the handle is stuck. Cheap you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Dione

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful luggage!!
customer_reviews.text: The luggage has held up to multiple trips including lots of abusive airline travel. It has some superficial scratches after my many trips, but otherwise looks new. My only complaint is the suitcases don't have any hooks that connect them but I was able to use ones I had from other luggage. It is high quality, the wheels work amazing and I am just super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gerber, MD

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: The luggage arrived on time and was packed well. There was no damage. For the price, this is a really nice set and I love the color (Wine). So very easy to maneuver, all it needs is a light touch to guide it and it rolls on. Lots of room inside. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great check in baggage!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is great. The middle piece is not suitable for a carry-on and the smaller piece is quite small (because wheels take up so much inches), but they are all sturdy, great color and the rollers are truly easy and maneuverable. I put a few Clemson stickers on to easily pick mine off the belt and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Atta Travel

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Love the bags!!! My wish would be that they all would be expandable, they could have more compartments and they would be softer on the inside.... However that is mere fluff compared to the handling of the bags. My daughter pushed one... then said she didn’t realize how heavy it was until she picked it up!!! They are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on pretty solid luggage. I wanted something decent but don’t travel much so I didn’t need to buy some expensive set of luggage. This was perfect. Just solid enough to protect and yet playable enough to give when the airport staff ever so gently tosses it around.
customer_reviews.author: John Patterson

product_meta.title: Coolife Luggage Expandable Suitcase PC+ABS 3 Piece Set with TSA Lock Spinner 20in24in28in
feature_bullets: ABS+PC material, durable and lighter hard shell, features textured finish to prevent against scratches. The beveled edge design on the upper part increases toughness for the luggage.
20inch and 24inch luggage is perfect for business and personal travel, 28in is expandable add 15% to the scalable space.

Sturdy ergonomic aluminum telescoping handle system provides fluent and smooth experience. The unique shaped multi-directional silent wheels will not make any noise when being rotated and it’s more durable in structure.
TSA lock which allows only TSA agents to inspect your bags without damaging the lock.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,056 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
